Name: OpenPuff
Description: OpenPuff is a professional steganography tool that supports a wide range of carrier formats for embedding data.
HTU: Install OpenPuff, choose the carrier file, embed the data, and extract it using the same tool.

Name: Steghide
Description: Steghide is an open-source steganography tool that allows you to embed data in image and audio files.
HTU: Install Steghide, use `steghide embed` to hide data and `steghide extract` to retrieve it.

Name: Stegano
Description: Stegano is a Python library for hiding messages and files within image files.
HTU: Install Stegano using pip, use the library functions to hide and retrieve data from images.

Name: LSB-Steganography
Description: Hide and Seek is a steganography tool that allows you to hide files within image files.
HTU: Install Hide and Seek, choose the carrier image, embed the data file, and extract it using the same tool.

Name: OpenStego
Description: OpenStego is an open-source steganography tool that provides data hiding and watermarking capabilities.
HTU: Install OpenStego, choose the carrier file, embed the data, and extract it using the same tool.
